entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
